channel.title: Public Double GetItemShopValue?

item.title: Public Double GetItemShopValue?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Are you dumb or something…? In shops.cfg it only shows what item is in what shop and the amount of the item. It doesn’t show the price of the item there, the prices are in item.cfg.

Read full topic

item.title: Public Double GetItemShopValue?
item.dc:creator: @chop chop
item.description:
@chop wrote:

ok well i couldnt find the shop values of any item so i started searching and i found this…

public double GetItemShopValue(int ItemID, int Type, int fromSlot) { double ShopValue = 1; double Overstock = 0; double TotPrice = 0; for (int i = 0; i < server.itemHandler.MaxListedItems; i++) { if (server.itemHandler.ItemList[i] != null) { if (server.itemHandler.ItemList[i].itemId == ItemID) { ShopValue = server.itemHandler.ItemList[i].ShopValue; } } }

ok well i searched in itemHandler.java but couldnt find them…
i searched in itemList.java but couldnt find them… anyone know where i can find them lol?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 22, 2007, 04:32:01 AM[/size][hr]anyone know yet?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 23, 2007, 02:38:34 AM[/size][hr]omg no one knows how to change the price you buy items for in the shops!!!

Read full topic
